text: Nele Hertling née Schröder (born 23 February 1934) is a German theatre manager. She worked for the Academy of Arts, Berlin, from 1962. She also founded the Pantomime-Musik-Tanz-Theater in 1970 and the Tanz im August festival in 1988. She managed the program for Berlin as the European City of Culture.Rolf Hosfeld, Andi Schoon: Festivals 2007/2008. title: Nele Hertling
